title: padumanaabhan maruga muruga
sahitya:
padumaabhan marugaa murugaa

(paduma)



anupallavi



nidam anaadi bhavasaagara alaiyil

nilaiyilaa tuzhalaviTTiDa tagumO

(paduma)



caraNam



kanavilum shaNmugaa guhaavenak kaudinin ninaivaRaada Ezhai

analinung koDiya veng kaamamudal aRuvaral puzhivin nondiDa tagumO

(paduma)
